divs: Sighting Details1. coming backing from doing laundry, it was night 2. checking rear view mirror and side of roads incase of deer or elk , notice light at upper right of my windshield, told my daughter to look, look, i got in shock. 3. i thought maybe head lights. but realized its above the tree tops 4. it was just stationary, the lights where already on when we saw it, when i slowed down it started turning off one by one 5. i got in shock, disbelief, scared, i had a child with us, i started getting tingling all over and then noticed my leg was shaking, i had to calm down because i had a preschooler with me, he might have saw the lights also, 6.i kept driving , but when we got to town in whiteriver, at the stop light , it turned red, i looked to the right , and there it was again above the mountains, it had four lights , just in mid air above the mountains , we just wanted to get home, we couldnt sleep for awhile, i still feel scared, i think someone needs to know.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Whiteriver
There was one other sighting in Whiteriver on or around November 29th 2012
Summary: driving by turn off, looked upper right of drivers side , lights came on first four , then below that another four, huge
